pr_title: Change groupId to com.azure and artifactId to azure-spring-cloud-starter-xxx

timeline.message: Change groupId to com.azure and artifactId to azure-spring-cloud-starter-xxx
update version & version_client.txt & readme & enforcer plugin
Update the pom.xml, folder name, ci.yml in the cloud-related samples under Spring-boot-samples
Update the hyperlink on README to change the folders name

timeline.bodyText: This should not be named as xxx-starter-context, let's remove the starter word.
timeline.author: saragluna
timeline.diffHunk:
